apps.name: Provenance EMU
apps.subtitle: Multi-emulator frontend for iOS & tvOS
apps.versionDescription: Many bug fixes, SwiftUI additions, new cores, new features and more. See GitHub changelog for more info.
apps.localizedDescription: Multi-emulator frontend, supporting various Atari, Bandai, NEC, Nintendo, Sega, SNK and Sony console systems.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Provenance to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

news.title: Provenance 2.2.0 released with major bug fixes, new features like movable buttons and more
news.caption: 2.2.0 released. Onscreen controls fixes, movable buttons, core upgrades, new cores, new features and more. Read the article for a full demo of changes.

news.title: Provenance 2.1.1 released with minor but important UI fixes
news.caption: 2.1.1 released PSX on screen joystick controller fix, fceux update, SwiftUI updates.

news.title: Provenance 2.1.0 released with many UI, configuration and controller improvements
news.caption: 2.1.0 released with improved UI, many more core options, performance improvements, core updates and much more. Read the article for a full demo of changes.

news.title: New cores in the works. 2.0.3 released.
news.caption: 2.0.3 release with fixes and core updates. Coming soon, new cores. PSP (PPSSPP), PS2 (Play!), Enhanced PS1 (Duckstation), Dreamcast (flycast), ColecoVision, IntelliVision, Dolphin and more are under active development and all closer to finished than not. Please support us on Patreaon to help move development forwards.
